sys_script_client.description: RequestorLookupOnChange sets the reqestor_name field to the value of the first_name and last_name of the record selected in the User record, by the option selected in the Requestor Lookup Lookup. If the reqestor_name is not a null string, it is not set to the value of the lookup.
sys_script_client.name: RequestorLookupOnChange
